name: Receptionist
text:
Receptionist
A receptionist at the KPJK radio station in New Mexico was murdered by a strange being.
Biography
On the night of August 5, 1956, the receptionist was filing papers when a pitch-black woodsman entered the studio. She walked toward him as though hypnotized, while he repeatedly asked "Gotta light?" The woodsman then grabbed her by the back of the head, forcing her to her knees and splitting her skull apart.
